title: Well Known Artist Loft with FREE Laundry - Must See
description:
Available early April:
Welcome to 109 W Wildey St #111 at the Schoolhouse Lofts! The Schoolhouse Lofts are a community of modern-industrial artist lofts inside the historic Daniel Boone School located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties area of Philadelphia. This beautiful, late gothic revival building was classically known as the Philadelphia school for the rebellious. This building brings a unique mix of old and new with trendy design elements like minimalistic lighting fixtures, exposed beams, original brick work, and fantastically intricate original details. This leading boutique building offers modern conveniences for modern living. The public spaces such as the elevator, mailroom, and multiple laundry rooms are custom engineered to minimize stress and maximize well-being. Unit #111 is a fantastic studio apartment, offering high ceilings, huge windows, 3 closets for great storage space, and a bright and airy atmosphere. You enter the unit into a hallway with hardwood floors and exposed beams that continue throughout the entire space. There is a kitchen to the left with tile backsplash, granite countertops, great cabinetry for storage, and a full set of stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, oven/stove, and refrigerator. This large unit offers space for a living/dining area in front of the kitchen by the 4 giant windows – perfect for your plants! A black divider offers privacy for a bed towards the back left of the apartment. Your bathroom offers a medicine cabinet, vanity, and shower/tub combo. All units have Central A/C! FREE laundry in laundry rooms located on the 1st, 2nd, and Penthouse floors of the building. Schedule a showing today!
About the Neighborhood:
Located at the cross-section of Fishtown and Northern Liberties, among some of the city’s best dining, shopping, and entertainment options. Walkable to the Piazza Dog Park, Tiptop Playground, and Penn Treaty Park. Easy access to highways I-95 and I-676, as well as public transportation with the Girard station for the Market-Frankford line just a block away. You’ll be walking distance to The Piazza at Schmidts, Acme, Love & Honey Fried Chicken, Jerry’s Bar, Heritage, One Shot Coffee, and Murph’s. to name a few.

Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and water. Water and gas billed by a 3rd party company.

title: Seasonal Bike Share Program, Beautiful courtyards, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 1211 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home features wood floors. The large windows face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as March 30, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., or the Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books, magazines, and journals at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, and Sephora. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at Ultimo or La Colombe. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Stroll across the park and then buy an artisanal loaf of bread at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. View an exhibition at the Franklin Institute. There is so much to do in this area!

description:
Fantastic opportunity to live in the luxuriously renovated Cigar Factory in Northern Liberties. Minutes from Liberties Walk, Fishtown, restaurants, bars, shops, public transportation (Market-Frankford line) and easy access to I-95. This 1,500 square foot, 2 bedroom ( 1 small), 2 full bathroom condo has 14 foot ceilings, 8 foot tall windows , concrete floors and original 1890 exposed brick throughout. Kitchen has top of the line appliances, granite countertops and tons of cabinet space. The master bedroom is fully surrounded by exposed brick. The master bathroom has his and her sinks, a jacuzzi tub and walk-in shower. In addition to the master bedroom, there is an additional space noted as a bedroom, that is currently being used as a huge walk in closet that can also be used as an in home office, work out space, or even a wine closet. Off of the open concept living area, there is an additional walk in closet. Unit also includes central air/heating, coat closet, washer/dryer included (in second bathroom), single dedicated parking space in bottom floor garage, additional storage area at rear of parking space,elevator access to all floors, call box entry. The indoor parking space can fit an over-sized vehicle and is a very rare amenity that you don't usually find in Northern Liberties. It is even heated for those cold winter mornings. Never worry about parking again! No smoking. Pets are allowed. First and last months, as well as one month's security deposit required for move in.

title: 4417 Pine St -- Studio Apt for Rent 6/1/22 (12 month lease)
description:
Hello –
I am searching for a reliable tenant to take over my lease at 4417 Pine Street, Apt. 302, Philadelphia PA 19104. The new lease would begin on June 1st, 2022 and must be signed for 12 months.
I have been here for 6 years, and it is a wonderful opportunity for a student or young professional seeking to live on their own. Excellent location just outside of Penn’s campus.
Tenant pays cooking gas ($25 flat fee), electric, cable/internet.
Laundry machines (pay via coin or via an app) are available on the bottom floor.
Requirements:
-	$50 non-refundable application/credit check fee (through the management company New Horizons Housing)
-	A credit score of 650 with no prior evictions
An acceptance letter to a local university can also be accepted in lieu of a credit score
-	“As-is” move-in
I will clean before I vacate, but the management company will not clean/repaint when new tenant moves in
-	Proof of income; unemployment cannot be used as proof of income
-	Agreement of a 12-month lease with New Horizons
-	NO Dogs, but cats are welcome
-      Parking is available for an additional fee
Move-in Costs:
-	Security deposit equal to one month’s rent ($775)
-	First month’s rent ($775)
-	Last month’s rent ($775)
-	Liability insurance charges for first month ($12.50) or proof of individual renter’s insurance policy
-	First month’s cooking gas ($25)
-	Rent/cooking gas/liability insurance charges will recur monthly
Please email me if interested and I will provide my phone number for serious inquiries and to schedule a viewing.

title: a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties!
description:
Welcome HOME to 117 Fairmount Ave -- a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties! Enter through the vestibule into a sunny and spacious living area equipped with oversized windows and a working fireplace, followed by the large dining area, a convenient half bath, and the kitchen - featuring stainless steel appliances, striking backsplash, eat-in peninsula, and plenty of cabinet and counter space. Just off the kitchen is the secluded back patio - perfect for gardening, grilling, entertaining, or kicking back to relax. The second floor is home to the primary bedroom, a large bathroom with claw foot tub and separate stall shower, and the second bedroom which boasts a built-in wet vanity and plenty of closet space. The third floor consists of the third bedroom which gets plenty of natural light, and a half flight of stairs takes you to the lofted fourth bedroom with vaulted ceilings and large windows allowing for fabulous views of the waterfront and Ben Franklin Bridge. Throughout the home, you'll enjoy ample storage space, original decorative arched windows, high ceilings, original hard wood flooring, clean basement with laundry, and loads of historic charm. Last but certainly not least, THE LOCATION is amazing -- a stone's throw from all that NoLibs has to offer; situated within close walking distance to local favorites and shopping/dining/nightlife on 2nd Street; easy commute to Old City, Fishtown, Center City, and beyond; close to grocery stores, convenience stores, highways, hospitals, parks, playgrounds, public transportation, and much much more! BONUS PERKS: Landlords arrange for a monthly house cleaning service at no cost to the tenant!! The block has restricted parking, so if you get a PPA permit you can park in front of the house at almost any time!! Schedule your today -- you need to see this one in person!

Included with your monthly rental price is extended cable TV service, fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant, and more!! Walk off the busy street into 640 North Broad and enter an urban space that combines the old with the new. Feel the past mix with a refreshing dose of hip, understated sophistication. Setting the night sky aglow, our glass-domed pool house is the perfect place to unwind. Experience orange as it bursts in the artwork and pours from geometric ceiling lights that warm the mocha-colored floors. title: Beautiful One Bedroom , Close To Trails
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

title: Beautiful 2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Apartment Home, City View, Gym, Sauna
description:
The home at 1902 is a 1,185 square foot Da Vinci two bedroom two bathroom apartment home in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! This home on the 19th floor has windows that face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a city view. The beautiful kitchen and bathrooms are definitely a must see! There is also abundant closet space for plenty of storage. Experience the convenience of having a combination washer and dryer inside your new home! Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores and restaurants! Target, Giant, Trader Joe's, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Shop at the retail stores of Rittenhouse Row such as Barnes & Noble, Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., Paper Source, L'Occitane, Boyds, Banana Republic Factory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Devon Seafood Grill, a.bar, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, Via Locusta, The Love, Marathon Grill, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, and Alice Pizza. Sip a delicious coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in a beautiful French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of artisanal bread from Metropolitan Bakery.

* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room

* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views

* Large laundry facility on the 3rd floor

title: Centrally Located Condo Available April
description:
Welcome to Chestnut View Condominiums, one of the premier condo buildings in the heart of downtown Philadelphia.
Now available for rent is a recently renovated, corner unit, large one bedroom apartment with all the modern amenities for contemporary living.
Enter this beautifully remodeled condo into a long hallway featuring hardwood floors throughout with excellent closet and storage space. The large bathroom has recently been upgraded including white subway tile, black hexagon tile flooring, glass shower door and a modern vanity. Enter into the sun-filled kitchen and living room area boasting upgraded amenities including brand new white cabinetry, granite counter top, stainless steel appliances and the same white subway tile back splash contrasted by the beautiful black hexagon tile flooring as the bathroom. The spacious living room has multiple windows on each side allowing ample natural sunlight and includes a gorgeous crown molding. All this in a secure, elevator building with on-site laundry!
This apartment is centrally located in a walkers paradise with a walk score of 99! Be just steps away from fabulous eateries, shops, entertainment, gyms, parks and night-life. A block away from Trader Joe’s and a couple blocks away from Rittenhouse Square park. Also close to the historic Art Museum area and other center city comforts - live in one of the most exciting downtown Philadelphia neighborhoods! Easy accessibility to major highways, walking distance to 30th street station as well as other public transportation. Schedule your appointment today, you’ll love city life in this fabulous apartment!
Renter responsible for electric. Condo covers hot water. Pets accepted on a case by case basis with a pet deposit. Contact me via email to coordinate a showing!

title: Large Studio In Historic Building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.
-Listed on the National Historic Register
-Smoke-free apartments available
-Complimentary Wi-Fi lounge
-Spacious floor plans with large bedrooms and closets
-This is a cat friendly community
-Seasonal Bike Share Program
-24/7 emergency maintenance service
-Modernista Apartment kitchens with stainless steel appliances available
-Garage and parking lot available
-Elevator building
-Professional on-site management team
-Beautiful courtyards

title: a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties!
description:
Welcome HOME to 117 Fairmount Ave -- a historic gem located in the heart of Northern Liberties! Enter through the vestibule into a sunny and spacious living area equipped with oversized windows and a working fireplace, followed by the large dining area, a convenient half bath, and the kitchen - featuring stainless steel appliances, striking backsplash, eat-in peninsula, and plenty of cabinet and counter space. Just off the kitchen is the secluded back patio - perfect for gardening, grilling, entertaining, or kicking back to relax. The second floor is home to the primary bedroom, a large bathroom with claw foot tub and separate stall shower, and the second bedroom which boasts a built-in wet vanity and plenty of closet space. The third floor consists of the third bedroom which gets plenty of natural light, and a half flight of stairs takes you to the lofted fourth bedroom with vaulted ceilings and large windows allowing for fabulous views of the waterfront and Ben Franklin Bridge. Throughout the home, you'll enjoy ample storage space, original decorative arched windows, high ceilings, original hard wood flooring, clean basement with laundry, and loads of historic charm. Last but certainly not least, THE LOCATION is amazing -- a stone's throw from all that NoLibs has to offer; situated within close walking distance to local favorites and shopping/dining/nightlife on 2nd Street; easy commute to Old City, Fishtown, Center City, and beyond; close to grocery stores, convenience stores, highways, hospitals, parks, playgrounds, public transportation, and much much more! BONUS PERKS: Landlords arrange for a monthly house cleaning service at no cost to the tenant!! The block has restricted parking, so if you get a PPA permit you can park in front of the house at almost any time!! Schedule your today -- you need to see this one in person!
Laundry in Building Parking available Gym Available Pets Allowed

title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

title: This trinity-style home is cute as a button.
description:
Welcome to an original "tiny house". This trinity-style home is cute as a button. Located on a quaint quiet street in the Washington Square neighborhood, this 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home has character and charm. When you enter the home you are greeted by a living space that has windows on both sides, a working gas fireplace, access to the private patio, and a coat closet. Follow the spiral stairs down a level to the kitchen. This kitchen has all the necessary appliances including a washer & dryer in the closet next to the fridge. There is a small space for a bistro table and plenty of cabinets for storage. The spiral stairs up from the living room take you to the 2nd floor which houses the first of two bedrooms, with windows, 2 closets, and the home's full bathroom with a shower/tub combo, and a hall linen closet. Follow the stairs up one more level to the main bedroom. This encompasses the full floor. Windows on both sides let in lots of natural light, the ceiling fan helps with circulating the central heat and air, there are two closets on this floor and plenty of room for your bed, dresser, and nightstands. The patio outside allows for a grill, a small table and chairs, and your green thumb if you have one. The alley next to the home is gated and locked. It allows access to the street for your bike or to take out your garbage without going through the home. This location is a walker and rider paradise. A whole home to yourself. Come visit!
